name: DCH Individual Requirement - GP Opt Out Indicator
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes whether the parent/carer or child declined to register with a NHS GP
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Does not wish to register with an NHS general practitioner
